about_the_game:
VRLab Academy: Anatomy VR is an interactive anatomy atlas.
Walk through the futuristic VRLab. Navigate smoothly and effortlessly, in this beautiful. and modern yet highly optimized Vr experience
See the body disappears before your very eyes only to show the inner workings of the human anatomy.
You can take any of the human organs, and inspect it with your virtual hands and eyes. Feel the beating heart or the breathing lungs. See the food traveling through the human body.
See the:
Body systems Include
- Muscular System
- Skeletal System
- Urinary System
- Digestive System
- Lymphatic system
- Cardiovascular System
- System ventilators
- Nervous System

Please note that this is the Demo version with respect to VRLab Academy experiments.

You can take any of the human organs, and inspect it with your virtual hands and eyes. Feel the beating heart or the breathing lungs. See the food traveling through the human body.

name: VRLab Academy Anatomy VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Processor: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Processor: Windows® 8.1 or later, Windows® 10
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: VRLab Anatomy is an interactive human anatomy atlas. Explore 8 human anatomical systems in the futuristic lab. You can see them all in the human body. All without leaving your room This application is a great learning tool, showing realistic models of human anatomy.
